sludge_fountain.name: Fountain of Sludge
sludge_fountain.interact_message: Bathe in the sludge, absorbing its power?
sludge_fountain.description: Layers of downwards-sloping, fossilized bracket fungus have been sculpted by eons of sludge. You cannot see any source of the liquid, only the path of least resistance that it travels towards the moss-thickened cave floor. Bizarre moths flutter about, tasting the cyan goo.

shanty_door_top.name: Shanty Door
shanty_door_top.description: This poorly constructed door is made from planks of stained, misshapen wood, covered in knots and burrs. Wood is rarely seen here, but the builder either does not know or does not care.

shanty_door_side.name: Shanty Door
shanty_door_side.description: This poorly constructed door is made from planks of stained, misshapen wood, covered in knots and burrs. Wood is rarely seen here, but the builder either does not know or does not care.

metal_door_top.name: Metal Door
metal_door_top.description: A smooth and sturdy-looking door made out of a glossy silver metal. This seems to have completely avoided any corrosion or corruption due to the mechanics of the Sludgeworks.

metal_door_side.name: Metal Door
metal_door_side.description: A smooth and sturdy-looking door made out of a glossy silver metal. This seems to have completely avoided any corrosion or corruption due to the mechanics of the Sludgeworks.
